short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Web extension that applies a modern dark mode theme to the AOU Student Information System (SIS).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚ú® Revitalize Your AOU SIS Experience with ModernSIS! ‚ú®

Transform your AOU Student Information System (SIS) into a visually stunning, user-friendly platform with ModernSIS! Enjoy a sleek, modern interface with three unique themes: Modern White, Calm Navy, and Midnight Blue! ‚Äî and stay tuned for more themes coming soon!

üåç Universal Compatibility: ModernSIS is designed to work seamlessly across all regions. Our current focus is on delivering top-tier performance and stability for users in the Egyptian region, with ongoing testing and enhancements.

üîí Privacy First: Your data is yours alone. ModernSIS does not collect, store, or share any personal information, and it connects only to the AOU SIS and aou.edu.eg sites ‚Äî ensuring a secure and private browsing experience.

üöÄ Open-Source and Community-Driven: We believe in transparency and collaboration. Check out our GitHub repository for the latest updates, or to contribute and help make ModernSIS even better!

GitHub Repository | https://github.com/MohamedAAbdallah/ModernSIS

Upgrade to ModernSIS today and enjoy a more beautiful, focused, and privacy-respecting experience on your AOU SIS!
